body_html:
Many thanks. I've also discovered on building from the latest source that data_format gives an error because one MKL op is trying to use "NDCHW" as the value. I assume that has been reported but wanted to let you know. Thanks so much to the team for the great work.
…
On Thu, Apr 26, 2018, 9:37 AM Guozhong Zhuang ***@***.***> wrote: Hi Tony, It is not merged yet, as we are handling other concat related issues (e.g. empty tensor with ndims=0 as input). I will let you when we are ready for public PR. Can you confirm that the fix has been merged into those? Thanks. -Tony — You are receiving this because you commented. body_text:
Many thanks.

I've also discovered on building from the latest source that data_format
gives an error because one MKL op is trying to use "NDCHW" as the value. I
assume that has been reported but wanted to let you know.

Thanks so much to the team for the great work.
…
On Thu, Apr 26, 2018, 9:37 AM Guozhong Zhuang ***@***.***> wrote:
 Hi Tony,

 It is not merged yet, as we are handling other concat related issues (e.g.
 empty tensor with ndims=0 as input).
 I will let you when we are ready for public PR.

 Thanks,
 GZ

 From: Tony Reina ***@***.***
 Sent: Wednesday, April 25, 2018 5:06 PM

 (#17494)


 I still see the bug in 1.7 and the 1.8 rc1. Can you confirm that the fix
 has been merged into those?

 Thanks.
 -Tony

body:
Many thanks.

I've also discovered on building from the latest source that data_format
gives an error because one MKL op is trying to use "NDCHW" as the value. I
assume that has been reported but wanted to let you know.

Thanks so much to the team for the great work.

wrote:
